name: Lord Flea
description: '''Lord Flea''' was the stage name of '''Norman Byfield Thomas''' (1931/32 or 1933/34 â€“ 18 May 1959), a Jamaican [[mento]] musician credited with "helping start the [[Calypso (music)|calypso]] craze in U.S." With his band The Calypsonians, Flea toured America throughout the late 1950s, and released an album on the [[Capitol Records|Capitol label]].  The band also performed in two calypso-related films.
